T02D2689:320b-1: sarba ta th'a ga toshn'i sha bh'a ba si t'a ta pa tre n'a ma dri tti ;

T02D2689:321b-37: gis 'khor ba'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i chu srin

T02D2689:322a-1: rdo rje skyil mo krung dang mnyam par gzhag pa

T02D2689:322a-4: phyir gtsug tor rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i
T02D2689:322a-5: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
T02D2689:322a-6: snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu zhes bya ba ni rjes thogs la'o //

T02D2689:322a-9: dbyings rig cing khams gsum 'khor ba las skyob par
T02D2689:322a-10: byed pa'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs te /

T02D2689:322a-12: de'i brjod bya'i don 'gro ba thams cad kyi skyabs

T02D2689:322a-34: yang dag par zhugs pa ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi

T02D2689:322b-5: thob pa'i rigs sngags grub pa'i drang srong phrin las

T02D2689:322b-20: ldan nag po chen po rgyal po mang pos bkur

T02D2689:322b-22: khrod chen po so sa li la sogs pa brgyad
T02D2689:322b-23: du gnas nas phyogs skyong ba brgyad kyi chung ma

T02D2689:322b-27: rnam par gzigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs so //

T02D2689:322b-29: thams cad skyob ni rdo rje'i rigs so //
T02D2689:322b-30: 'khor ba 'jig ni nor bu'i rigs so //
T02D2689:322b-31: gser thub ni dpal gyi glang po che bzhin du

T02D2689:322b-35: ma dros pa la sogs pa btul bas klu'i rigs

T02D2689:323a-26: mo bcu bdun phyung ba ni /

T02D2689:323a-37: nub phyogs kyi dkar mo chen mos ni gsod pa

T02D2689:323a-39: // byang phyogs kyi sgrol mas ni ngan song du

T02D2689:330a-16: yams kyi nad dang zhes bya ba nas 'brug gi
T02D2689:330a-17: sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du
T02D2689:330a-19: nye bar 'tshe ba dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad dang /
T02D2689:330a-21: sdug bsngal brgyad byung ba de'i tshe sngar bstan pa'i
T02D2689:330a-22: tshogs bsags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnal 'byor byas nas
T02D2689:330a-23: lan gsum bzlas na de thams cad nye bar zhi
T02D2689:330a-24: bar 'gyur ro // nye ba'i snying po'i 'khor lo
T02D2689:330a-25: ras la bris nas sngags lan gsum bzlas na yang
T02D2689:330a-27: gzhung gi don bshad zin to //
T02D2689:330a-28: rjes su yi rang zhing bstod pa ni sangs rgyas
T02D2689:330a-29: dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa 'jig rten
T02D2689:330a-34: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa'i 'khor gyis rjes su yi rang zhing bstod pa'o //
T02D2689:330a-35: gtsug tor gdugs dkar mchog grub gzungs //
T02D2689:330a-36: sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa la //
T02D2689:330a-37: lag na rdo rjes rab bsdus pa //
T02D2689:330a-38: brgyud pa'i rim pa bla mas bshad //
T02D2689:330a-39: thos nas gdams ngag bris pa las //
T02D2689:330a-40: bdag gis dge ba ci bsags pa //
T02D2689:330a-41: de yis sems can thams cad ni //
T02D2689:330a-42: rnam snang mdzad chen grags chen shod /
T02D2689:330a-43: 'phags ma de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor nas byung
T02D2689:330a-44: ba gdugs dkar mo can gzhan gyis mi thub pa
T02D2689:330a-45: phyir bzlog pa chen mo zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa
T02D2689:330a-46: slob dpon sh'u ram ga warma badzras mdzad pa rdzogs
